channel.title: Methyltransferase on COTTON

item.title: GhOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A01G2052 Gene Symbol: GhOMT1 Gene Name: flavonoid O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Function deficiency of GhOMT1 causes anthocyanidins over-accumulation and diversifies fibre colours in cotton.
